definition: nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to

sentences.english: With no enquiry, you are deemed to have fully understood the terms and conditions of this insurance contract.
sentences.chinese: 如未询问，则视同已经对合同内容完全理解并无异议。

sentences.english: It is the perfect storm for the dollar, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 对美元来说这无异于一场完美风暴，”他说。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, it's a case of the fox guarding the henhouse.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，这种做法无异于请狐狸去照看鸡窝。

sentences.english: Single living for others is a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 单为别人的评价而活着的人无异于傀儡。

sentences.english: Zhou Youping face the same good behavior, and the lady is no different.
sentences.chinese: 周友平面容姣好，行为举止，与淑女无异。

sentences.english: I'm no better than (ie I'm treated like) a skivvy in this house.
sentences.chinese: 我在这个家里与仆人无异。

sentences.english: If no objections have been raised, the parties must execute the arbitration decision.
sentences.chinese: 对仲裁裁决无异议的，当事人必须履行。

sentences.english: Last week we called this a Congressional comb-over.
sentences.chinese: 上周我们曾戏称国会此举无异于拆东墙补西墙。

sentences.english: What this country is doing in Africa is as much as holding a light to the devil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家在非洲的行动无异于助桀为虐。

sentences.english: To ask him for help was like asking a tiger for its skin.
sentences.chinese: 向他求助无异于与虎谋皮。

sentences.english: I will bring them down like lambs to the slaughter, and like rams with kids.
sentences.chinese: 我必使他们下到屠场，无异羔羊绵羊和山羊。

sentences.english: To educate the young generation in such a way is just like making the rice shoots grow by pulling them up.
sentences.chinese: 用这种方法教育下一代无异于拔苗助长。

sentences.english: Comment upon this would be to paint the lily.
sentences.chinese: 对此发表评论无异于画蛇添足。

sentences.english: The parties involved must implement the adjudication if no objections are raised.
sentences.chinese: 对仲裁裁决无异议的，当事人必须履行。

sentences.english: The board's vote to hire Ms. Dean as CEO was unanimous .
sentences.chinese: 董事会无异议通过聘请狄恩女士担任执行长。

sentences.english: To love a women who scorns you is like licking honey from thorn .
sentences.chinese: 爱一个瞧不起你的女人无异于荆中舔蜜。

definition: there cannot be another one like it
to be precisely the same/to be no different
not at all the same/substantially different
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
just as/no less than/like (sth momentous)/as good as/tantamount to
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: as different as heaven and earth (idiom)/worlds apart
exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
